Uses of Class
com.intel.bigdatamem.CommonAllocator

  • Packages that use CommonAllocator 
    Package Description
    com.intel.bigdatamem  

    • Uses of CommonAllocator in com.intel.bigdatamem

      Classes in com.intel.bigdatamem with type parameters of type CommonAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Allocatable<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      an interface to allocate memory resources from any underlying memory kind of storage.
      interface  Allocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      an interface to manage the lifecycle of memory allocator
      class  CommonAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      an abstract common class for memory allocator to provide common functionalities.
      class  CommonPersistAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      an abstract common class for persistent memory allocator to provide common functionalities.
      class  MemBufferHolder<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      holder for a ByteBuffer instance.
      class  MemChunkHolder<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      holder for a memory chunk.
      static class  MemClustering.NodeConfig<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      configuration for each allocator node.
      class  MemHolder<A extends CommonAllocator<A>,T,H extends MemHolder<A,T,H>>
      hold a memory kind of resource.
      Subclasses of CommonAllocator in com.intel.bigdatamem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigDataMemAllocator
      manage a big native memory pool through libvmem.so that is provied by Intel nvml library.
      class  BigDataPMemAllocator
      manage a big native persistent memory pool through libpmalloc.so provided by pmalloc project.
      class  CommonPersistAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
      an abstract common class for persistent memory allocator to provide common functionalities.
      class  SysMemAllocator
      manage a system memory pool as a internal volatile allocator
